meanings.definition: The act of pressing clothes with a heated iron to remove wrinkles.
meanings.sent1: I do the ironing every Sunday to make my clothes look nice.
meanings.sent2: My mom taught me how to do the ironing properly.
meanings.sent3: After a long day, the ironing pile seemed to mock me from across the room.
meanings.sent4: She tackled the mountain of laundry with the determination of a warrior facing a fierce opponent in battle.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ironing board being set up echoed through the quiet house.

meanings.definition: The process of smoothing out fabric using a hot iron.
meanings.sent1: The ironing of the curtains made them look brand new.
meanings.sent2: She carefully performed the ironing on the delicate silk fabric.
meanings.sent3: The ironing transformed the wrinkled cloth into a smooth masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The ironing was like magic, turning the crumpled material into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The steam from the ironing filled the room with a warm, comforting scent.

meanings.definition: The task of ironing clothes to make them neat and wrinkle-free.
meanings.sent1: I always leave the ironing for last when doing laundry.
meanings.sent2: She finds the ironing relaxing and therapeutic.
meanings.sent3: The ironing board seemed to have a mind of its own, resisting every attempt to fold it.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the ironing was unmatched, resulting in perfectly pressed garments.
meanings.sent5: The satisfaction of completing the ironing made her day brighter.
